parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset that is associated with the event.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   desc: descending order
*   asc: ascending order

parameters.name: OrderField
parameters.description:
The sort field. Valid values:

*   GmtModified: sorts the events by creation time. This is the default value.
*   ThreatScore: sorts the events by risk score.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the event. Valid values:

*   0: unhandled
*   1: handling
*   5: handling failed
*   10: handled

parameters.name: ThreadLevel
parameters.description:
The risk levels of the events. The value is a JSON array. Valid values:

*   serious: high
*   suspicious: medium
*   remind: low
